name.baseName: Tire production;Blended compound;Cutting and forming; Fiber fabric,Steel fabric
轮胎生产;混合化合物;切割和成型;纤维织物，钢织物

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the production stage is quite complex andincludes the processes of compound blending, rolling, extrusion, packet ring production, cutting and forming, vulcanizing, and testing. We combined closely related processes toavoid allocation. The following four main production processes were identified: compound blending, rolling and extrusion,cutting and forming, and vulcanizing and testin
生产阶段相当复杂，包括复合共混、轧制、挤出、包环生产、切割成型、硫化和测试等工艺。我们将密切相关的流程与避免分配。确定了以下四种主要生产工艺：复合共混、轧制和挤出，切割成型，硫化成型。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: “Data collected onsite in 2014 by one of the largest Chinese tire companies were used in the assessment. ”The article has stated that the data is related to 2014, but there is no specific time, so the time is set on January 1, 2014.
”评估中使用了中国最大的轮胎公司之一在2014年现场收集的数据“。文章中已说明数据调研与2014年，但没有具体时间，所以该时间定位2014年1月1日。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents a tire production process, generally involving the compounding, mixing, cutting, shaping, and vulcanizing of different materials including fiber fabric and steel fabric to manufacture tires. The production process is sophisticated and used in the mass manufacturing of various types of tires suitable for vehicles that require high-quality, reliable rubber tires for different applications, including passenger vehicles, commercial trucks, and other heavy-duty applications.
该数据集代表了轮胎生产过程，通常涉及复合共混、切割、成型和硫化不同材料（包括纤维织物和钢织物）来生产轮胎。这个生产过程是复杂的，用于大规模制造适用于各种类型的车辆所需的高品质、可靠橡胶轮胎，包括乘用车、商用卡车和其他重型应用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data on the raw materials used in the investigated tire product were sourced from on-site investigations of one of the largest Chinese tire companies. The data were collected in 2014 during the manufacture of the target tire product.Other materials, such as active clay, zinc oxide, stearic acid, processing agent, and lubricating oil, were also considered.
调查轮胎产品中使用的原材料数据来源于中国最大轮胎公司之一的现场调查。这些数据是在2014年目标轮胎产品制造期间收集的。还考虑了其他材料，如活性粘土、氧化锌、硬脂酸、加工剂和润滑油。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sun X, Liu J, Hong J, et al. Life cycle assessment of Chinese radial passenger vehicle tire[J]. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016, 21: 1749-1758.
Sun X, Liu J, Hong J, et al. Life cycle assessment of Chinese radial passenger vehicle tire[J]. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016, 21: 1749-1758.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The provided data set should be used with the understanding that it is based on 2014 practices and technologies of one of the largest Chinese tire companies. When using this LCA data, analysts must consider the time and geographic specificity of the data and account for potential changes in technology and practices when comparing to current processes. The allocation of environmental impacts should carefully adhere to avoiding splitting processes unnecessarily and ensuring that the relevant processes like compound blending, rolling, extrusion, cutting and forming, and vulcanization are accounted for as laid out in the data set.
应理解所提供数据集是基于中国最大轮胎公司之一在2014年当时的实践和技术。使用该LCA数据时，分析师必须考虑数据的时间和地理特定性，并在与当前工艺比较时，考虑技术和实践可能的变化。环境影响的分配应严格遵守，避免不必要地分割流程，并确保按照数据集的布局，将复合共混、轧制挤出、切割成型和硫化等相关流程纳入考虑。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Waste wire cord fabric,Waste steel wire
Waste wire cord fabric,Waste steel wire
